title: Programmers' Sanctuary
description: Hello, my name is Aaron. I am a student and a self-taught web developer for at least a year. My goal is to share my knowledge, learn, and help my family financially. In this portfolio, we will see what I have built so far.

index.description: Hello, my name is Aaron Ragudos. I am a student and a self-taught web developer for at least a year. My goal is to share my knowledge, learn, and help my family financially. In this portfolio, we will see what I have built so far.

about.title: A short sumary about me
about.description: I was not aware of the world of software development until I made a website for my school project. The challenges made me want to learn more about technology, specifically, web development. Thus, I started learning HTML5, CSS3, and Javascript on my own.

skills.title: Technologies I have used and learned
skills.description: A list of technologies I have learned and used in my projects. All of these are either me knowing the fundamentals or have built a project with them.
